title: Are there any artists you won’t listen to and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Won’t? No, not really. I'm assuming here you mean absolute refusal under all circumstances no matter what. There are many I don’t listen to by choice. Most of them because they just aren’t interesting enough or don’t tick other boxes for what I consider quality music. Some of them I strongly prefer not to listen to not just because they don’t make the cut but because I find them in one way or another displeasing. Not a lot of names come to mind and I’m not going to list them here. Some musicians I have no problem with in general but they have produced tracks I would prefer not to hear. But for the most part? Even if I don’t find the music to fit my concept of worth listening to I won’t object if someone else wishes to listen to/play it in my presence, e.g., at a friend’s place, a party, etc. And I will only leave if I am completely bored by everything. E.g., all my friends have gone home and I was only staying because I was still enjoying the music. When the music is under my control and I don’t have anyone else present whose tastes I should be considering, I will of course listen to only what I want to hear.
